0.9.0.name: wordpress/post-miner
0.9.0.description: Post Miner helps your audience discovering relevant content on your blog without searching. The plugin uses Euclidean distance and collective intelligence* (CI will be available from version 1.1.x) to provide a good match and better user experience.
